reviewText: I am so happy that they love these veggie tales - it is such great way for them to learn the lessons from so many of the familiar Bible stories.  They are gaining so much from watching Veggie Tales and watch them over and over,  The lunch bag is great to store the DVDs in but is insulated and will make a great lunch carrier.

Packaging was great, arrived quickly!
The veggie tales are her favorite videos. Getting 4 videos and the lunch box together was just a bonus. She loved it!
Love the packaging! Love the videos! It is just a great buy when you want to teach your kids/grandkids/nieces/nephews any child a good lesson with entertaining veggies!

Still loving Veggie Tales after 6 years.
My son is "too cool" for it, so I use the lunch bag, and it always starts a conversation.
Lunch bag is well constructed, you'll need a gel pack to keep food cool.
This was a great product! We liked it so much that we bought a set to give as a gift too! Great videos with a cool lunch box, a great combo!
